import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; class Searchtimeandregion extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ chooseMusuem:'1', chooseRegion:'1', chooseTime:'1', }; } timechange = (val) => { if(val.target.value==='1'){ this.setState() } } regionchange = (val) => { if(val.target.value==='1'){ this.setState() } } museumchange = (val) => { if(val.target.value==='1'){ this.setState() } } render() { return (
